CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "Dazzling Displays Exhibit Top Products at Fair...4. The fabulous Frankfort Distillers booth, stocked with Four Roses, Hunter and Paul Jones, was well represented by Lon Thompson of New York and Philadelphia, Sam Franke, district manager; Tom McGoire, Jack Peters and Steve Kirtis...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Lon Thompson, Sam Franke, Tom McGoire, Jack Peters, and Steve Kirtis standing in Hunter Blended Whiskey booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
